ygData.subject: Re: Exciting News!
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard this was a hoax.  I cannot confirm this at this time. ... _____________________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Free
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard this was a hoax. I cannot confirm this at this time.

--- Dennis Meek <dmeek01@...> wrote:
> From: "Dennis Meek" <dmeek01@...>
>
> As I am a master potter as well as a master smith, I
> am on both trade skill
> lists. Anyhow, there is a large buzz going on in
> the pottery list that I
> would like to share with all the other smiths out
> there!
>
> In the OoT (I do not know where yet), there is a
> merchant that is selling
> WEAPON SKETCHES! I believe that these sketches and
> proper ingredients, when
> propery formed at the wheel and burned at the kiln,
> form weapon molds!
> FINALLY! Maybe soon we will be selling weapons
> alongside our banded armor!
>
> If anyone else has any info, please share it.
> Thanks all!
>
> Haijar the Mage Blacksmith
>
>

> interests.
